update t_patient set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hospital_id = #{hospitalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district_id = #{districtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ward_id = #{wardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sickroom_no = #{sickroomNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cure_no = #{cureNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bed_no = #{bedNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nurse_level = #{nurseLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, marriage = #{marriage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, pca_code = #{pcaCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, duties = #{duties,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_type = #{idType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, id_number = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, height = #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, custom_infusion_rule = #{customInfusionRule,jdbcType=INTEGER}, run_status = #{runStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, admission_time = #{admissionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, discharge_time = #{dischargeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select a.id, code, name, sex, marriage, birthday, pca_code pcaCode, address, mobile, education, duties, id_type idType, id_number idNumber, height, weight, nurse_level nurseLevel, area_code areaCode, max_drip maxDrip, min_drip minDrip, max_time_len maxTimeLen, min_time_len minTimeLen, bottle_liquid_weight bottleLiquidWeight, bottle_weight bottleWeight, estimate_time_len estimateTimeLen, normal_drip as normalDrip,b.equipment_sn as equipmentSn,b.id as equmipId from t_patient a join t_patient_equip_ref b on a.id = b.patient_id
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT tpii.infusion_no infusionNo,tpii.sequence_id sequenceId,tpii.drug_name_list drugNameList,tpii.max_drip maxDrip, tpii.min_drip minDrip,tpii.max_time_len maxTimeLen,tpii.min_time_len minTimeLen,tpii.bottle_liquid_weight bottleLiquidWeight, tpii.bottle_weight bottleWeight,tpii.estimate_time_len estimateTimeLen,tpii.normal_drip normalDrip,tpii.run_status runStatus, tpii.begin_time beginTime,tper.equipment_sn equipmentSn,tie.battery_life_id batteryLifeId, tiet.voltage_warn voltageWarn,tiet.low_alarm lowAlarm,tiet.drip_warn dripWarn,tibl.voltage voltage, (SELECT SUM(continue_time) continueTime from t_infusion_battery_life WHERE id>=tie.battery_life_id) continueTime from t_patient_infusion_info tpii JOIN t_patient_equip_ref tper ON tpii.patient_id=tper.patient_id JOIN t_infusion_equip tie ON tper.equipment_sn=tie.equipment_sn JOIN t_infusion_equip_type tiet ON tie.infusion_equip_type=tiet.infusion_equip_type JOIN t_infusion_battery_life tibl ON tibl.id=tie.battery_life_id WHERE tie.`status`=1 AND tie.work_status=1 AND tiet.`status`=1 AND tpii.patient_id=#{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND tpii.run_status=1
